## Trove.create() method

Calculate the result of an [openTrove()](./lib-base.transactableliquity.opentrove.md) transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static create(params: any, borrowingRate: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | any | Parameters of the transaction. |
|  borrowingRate | any | Borrowing rate to use when calculating the Trove's debt. |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
